column4: How do i install a soundcard?? I have no sound, because the live cd didnt install my soundcard :'(
are you sure it wasn't installed? look at 'dmesg' and 'lspci'
i mean to make sure it was detected
i can here "system error sounds" or what they are called, the beeps but no other sound
yeah that's the beeps through your computer speaker i'd say, not through soundcard
do the 'lspci' command in a terminal
actually do 'lspci | grep audio' and tell me if anything comes up
it was working with another OS, ie Windows?
if i knew more about it, i could find out if there is a module available or something
hmm i really don't know then
you have to find out about the sound card
then i'm sure it can be made to work
